title: ticket
body: So first atall i never had any troubles with riot support always fast reaction time and very helpfull, however this time its taking much and much longer is usually got a reply within an day but im waiting 5 days rightnow is this normal is riot really busy or something because im not used to me having to wait over 5 days to recieve an email back last time i made a ticket it was all solved in 3 days. But now i havent even got an email back in 5 days (the ticket isnt for this account)

replies.body: It looks like your ticket was escalated to an account specialist, and was able to reach out to you today.  They'll be able to help out with your individual issue!
What category / topic what the ticket submitted in / about?
What was the reason you submitted the ticket?
i want to have my email reset because i dont have acces to the email anymore.

Are you replying to your ticket by chance? If yes, replying to a ticket puts it at the back of the queue, thus increasing the time it takes for a response. 

If not, an Account Support Specialist should get to you Today or Tomorrow. Let us know by the end of Tomorrow if nobody has gotten to you.

no i have never bumped my ticket i've never added any additional information if written the ticket and i've sat back for 5 days thats it nothing else. this might be normal but i dont think so seeing as i've used the ticket system quite a bit and i've mostly got everything solved within 5 days. 

greatly appriciate it :)
